item.title: Amazing Human Beings
item.description: 排名不分先后，持续更新: Benjamin Franklin James Stewart Novak Djokovic Herbert A. Simon Elizabeth Bishop Emily Dickinson Alan Turing Ada Lovelace Marie Curie Derek Sivers 孙玲
